relation: CAB is a student organization where they put on activities together for the whole school. Movie on the lawn, fall/spring carnival, snow day, talent shows, etc. I tend to also hang out with my friends a lot .
The dining is nice. The cookers cook whatever you want in front of you and it is fresh and tasty.

The dorms are spacious and nice. There are occasional socials that the RA's host for everyone to attend. It is a lot of fun. There are study rooms and a lobby where you can watch movies and play ping pong. Outside there is a basketball and volleyball court.

There is no way you can fail unless you literally try. This school is programed to make sure everyone passes. The professors work with you one on one if you need it, and the classrooms are small which makes it easier for professors to teach and know your name. There is also tutoring everywhere you go.
If you want a experience of a life time this school Is the school to attend. There a never a dull moment.

Texas A&M University of Kingsville is a life changing school. Not a day goes by in this small town where your not communicating with people and professors and making friends. This school shows you the way to where you want to be In life and lets you experience so much.
pageTitle: Texas A & M University-Kingsville Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {83618=The food and dining is awful and there are several that agree. The food is supposed to be home-like food but it is not. The dining room seems empty due to the food. There are times were the food is actually food but most of the time it is not. Sad fact is the price is about 1200 for a meal plan which is also over priced for food you cannot stand to eat three times a day seven days a week., 9447=All the professors here know how to teach students very well and keep learning interesting. I have a really awesome professor for History 1302, who I chose again for enjoying his 1301 class last semester, who constantly challenges us and keeps us interested. My English 1301 teacher is also my 1302 teacher because I chose to have him again. These are only two professors out of many and I am looking forward to meeting the rest and learning all that I can from them. Practically every teacher here has written a book on their studies and have earned their doctorates, so they are definitely credible in my opinion., 84292=The dorm life is ridiculous. The prices are too high. paying 3300 for a dorm is just a little too much and that is for the nicest one. Also the fact the the cheapest is about 1800 and honestly should be a lot less for what your living in. The room is not even up to date to be at that price. That is more than taking a full schedule of classes which does not seem right., 4518=I not sure yet I start Aug. 2009, 255971=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}
